author: tersec
content: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-6 has the text "Devnet-5 targets ..." and "included in devnet-5"

author: parithosh
content:
devnet-6 spec sheet: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-6

There are two major changes:
- 7702 change, We will have a EEST release, tracker found here: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/issues/1108
- The `blobGasPriceUpdateFraction` will be in all genesis files, please ensure your EL can handle reading it

Please respond in this thread about what branches we should use for your client. We have an internal EEST release and hive can be up as soon as we have client branches.

author: marekm3498
content: I’m sure it’s already on someone’s to-do list, but just to ensure we don’t forget about the Pectra contract deployments: https://hackmd.io/@_iAz6KERTsWIHHNF-wMxAA/S1Liid8u1l
